channel.title: CBN Spiritual Gifts Video Podcast: Foundations - An Introduction to Spiritual Gifts
channel.description: In this series of podcasts (taken from the CBN Spiritual Gifts Webcast), you'll hear from Gordon Robertson and other leading teachers about how God's Spiritual Gifts can change the life of the believer. You'll gain a biblical perspective on Holy Spirit, healing, miracles, words of knowledge and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: In this series of podcasts (taken from the CBN Spiritual Gifts Webcast), you'll hear from Gordon Robertson and other leading teachers about how God's Spiritual Gifts can change the life of the believer.
